title: Overtime Man-Hours Paid for All Employees on Hourly Basis, Class I Railroads for United States
notes:
Data Include Switching And Terminal Companies Until 1933. Data Include Overtime Paid At Pro-Rata As Well As Punitive Rates. Source: Interstate Commerce Commission, Wage Statistics Of Class I Steam Railroads In The U.S.

This NBER data series m08153 appears on the NBER website in Chapter 8 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter08.html.

NBER Indicator: m08153
